pre_caption: This video features a nighttime scenery shot of the Fontaine des Mers at Place de la Concorde in Paris. The illuminated fountain is prominently displayed, with the Eiffel Tower visible in the background in the first frame and a brightly lit Ferris wheel appearing in the second frame. The scene is vibrant, showcasing the city’s iconic landmarks under the night sky.
